name: parallax
description: AI agent orchestration platform with uncertainty as a first-class citizen

scripts.test:infra: cd packages/control-plane && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres etcd
scripts.dev:full: cd packages/control-plane && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && cd ../.. && pnpm run dev:control-plane
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm run dev:control-plane" "pnpm run dev:web" "pnpm run demo:patterns"
scripts.stop:all: docker-compose down && cd packages/control-plane && docker-compose down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && cd ../monitoring && docker-compose -f docker-compose.monitoring.yml down
scripts.reset: pnpm run stop:all && pnpm run clean && docker system prune -f
scripts.demo:python: cd apps/demo-python && poetry run python demo_agent.py
scripts.infra:postgres: cd packages/control-plane && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres
scripts.pattern:list: cd packages/cli && pnpm run cli pattern list
scripts.pattern:execute: cd packages/cli && pnpm run cli pattern execute
scripts.agent:list: cd packages/cli && pnpm run cli agent list
